nodes.text: Bog Bay was a collection of landing pads located in the Toydarian city of Riar. The pads were owned by the Gorensla kajidic and were built just above the water of a nearby swamp.
Bog Bay's administrator was a Toydarian female named Nel Henol. Docking. a ship for the day had a sticker price of 200 credits, but haggling could bring it down to about 100.
